mapper.sql: RYJCXXCJBH, JZRYBH, CJXXYYDM, XM, XMHYPY, GMSFHM, CYZJDM, ZJHM, XBDM, CSRQ, CYM, WWXM, BMCH, GJDM, MZDM, JGSSXDM, CSDSSXDM, CSDXZ, HJDSSXDM, HJDXZ, ZZMMDM, HYZKDM, XLDM, GRSFDM, RYLBDM, XZDQHDM, XZDXZ, AJLBDM, CJRXM, CJDWDM, CJDWMC, CJSJ, TSSFDM, ZJXYDM, COLLECT_CATEGORY_ID, STATUS, SCHEDULE, TASK_ID, EQUIPMENT_CODE, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME
mapper.select: select CJRXM from LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON group by CJRXM

select p.*,d1.name as cjxxyymc,d2.name as cyzjmc,d3.name as gjmc,d4.name as mzmc,d5.name as jgssxmc, d6.name as csdssxmc,d7.name as hjdssxmc,d8.name as zzmmmc,d9.name as xlmc,d10.name as rylbmc, d11.name as tssfmc,d12.name as xbmc,d13.name as zjxymc,d14.name as ajlbmc,d15.name as xzdqhmc, d16.name as hyzkmc,d17.name as grsfmc, c.collet_category_name as cjlbmc from LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON p left join SYS_DICT_LIST d1 on p.cjxxyydm = d1.code and d1.sign = 'DICT_RYCJYY' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d2 on p.cyzjdm = d2.code and d2.sign = 'DICT_RYCHYZHJ' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d3 on p.gjdm = d3.code and d3.sign = 'DICT_RYGJ' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d4 on p.mzdm = d4.code and d4.sign = 'DICT_RYMZ' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d5 on p.jgssxdm = d5.code and d5.sign = 'DICT_XZQH' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d6 on p.csdssxdm = d6.code and d6.sign = 'DICT_XZQH' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d7 on p.hjdssxdm = d7.code and d7.sign = 'DICT_XZQH' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d8 on p.zzmmdm = d8.code and d8.sign = 'DICT_RYZHZHMM' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d9 on p.xldm = d9.code and d9.sign = 'DICT_RYXL' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d10 on p.rylbdm = d10.code and d10.sign = 'DICT_RYLB' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d11 on p.tssfdm = d11.code and d11.sign = 'DICT_RYGRSHF' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d12 on p.xbdm = d12.code and d12.sign = 'DICT_RYXB' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d13 on p.zjxydm = d13.code and d13.sign = 'DICT_RYZJXY' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d14 on p.ajlbdm = d14.code and d14.sign = 'DICT_AJLB' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d15 on p.xzdqhdm = d15.code and d15.sign = 'DICT_XZQH' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d16 on p.hyzkdm = d16.code and d16.sign = 'DICT_RYHYZHK' left join SYS_DICT_LIST d17 on p.grsfdm = d17.code and d17.sign = 'DICT_RYGRSHF' left join LEDEN_COLLECT_CATEGORY c on p.collect_category_id = c.pk_id where p.ryjcxxcjbh = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON (RYJCXXCJBH, JZRYBH, CJXXYYDM, XM, XMHYPY, GMSFHM, CYZJDM, ZJHM, XBDM, CSRQ, CYM, WWXM, BMCH, GJDM, MZDM, JGSSXDM, CSDSSXDM, CSDXZ, HJDSSXDM, HJDXZ, ZZMMDM, HYZKDM, XLDM, GRSFDM, RYLBDM, XZDQHDM, XZDXZ, AJLBDM, CJRXM, CJDWDM, CJDWMC, CJSJ, TSSFDM, ZJXYDM, COLLECT_CATEGORY_ID, STATUS, SCHEDULE, TASK_ID, EQUIPMENT_CODE, DELETAG, ANNEX, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_DATETIME, JDXP ) values (#{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jzrybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjxxyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xmhypy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmsfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cyzjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wwxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bmch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jgssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzmmdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyzkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xldm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grsfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzdqhdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjdwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tssfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjxydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jdxp,jdbcType=BLOB} )

update LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON
JZRYBH = #{jzrybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CJXXYYDM = #{cjxxyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XMHYPY = #{xmhypy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMSFHM = #{gmsfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON set JZRYBH = #{jzrybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJXXYYDM = #{cjxxyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XMHYPY = #{xmhypy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMSFHM = #{gmsfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYZJDM = #{cyzjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XBDM = #{xbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CYM = #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WWXM = #{wwxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMCH = #{bmch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJDM = #{gjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MZDM = #{mzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGSSXDM = #{jgssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSDSSXDM = #{csdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSDXZ = #{csdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDSSXDM = #{hjdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDXZ = #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZMMDM = #{zzmmdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYZKDM = #{hyzkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XLDM = #{xldm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRSFDM = #{grsfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYLBDM = #{rylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZDQHDM = #{xzdqhdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZDXZ = #{xzdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AJLBDM = #{ajlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJRXM = #{cjrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJDWDM = #{cjdwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJDWMC = #{cjdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TSSFDM = #{tssfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJXYDM = #{zjxydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECT_CATEGORY_ID = #{collectCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEDULE = #{schedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_CODE = #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JDXP = #{jdxp,jdbcType=BLOB} where RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON set JZRYBH = #{jzrybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJXXYYDM = #{cjxxyydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XMHYPY = #{xmhypy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMSFHM = #{gmsfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CYZJDM = #{cyzjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XBDM = #{xbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CYM = #{cym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WWXM = #{wwxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BMCH = #{bmch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJDM = #{gjdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MZDM = #{mzdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JGSSXDM = #{jgssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSDSSXDM = #{csdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSDXZ = #{csdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDSSXDM = #{hjdssxdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HJDXZ = #{hjdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZMMDM = #{zzmmdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYZKDM = #{hyzkdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XLDM = #{xldm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRSFDM = #{grsfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYLBDM = #{rylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZDQHDM = #{xzdqhdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZDXZ = #{xzdxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AJLBDM = #{ajlbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJRXM = #{cjrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJDWDM = #{cjdwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJDWMC = #{cjdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CJSJ = #{cjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TSSFDM = #{tssfdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJXYDM = #{zjxydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECT_CATEGORY_ID = #{collectCategoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHEDULE = #{schedule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_CODE = #{equipmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETAG = #{deletag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANNEX = #{annex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowno,LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON.*
FROM LEDEN_COLLECT_PERSON
where ROWNUM <= #{end}) ledenCollectPerson
WHERE ledenCollectPerson.rowno >= #{start}

select person.*, d1.name as cjxxyy, d2.name as hjdxzqh, d3.name as xzdxzqh, stz.sg, stz.tz, stz.zc, d.RYDNABH as rydnabh from (select
from leden_collect_person) person left join ( select * from sys_dict_list where sign='DICT_RYCJYY' ) d1 on d1.code=person.cjxxyydm left join ( select * from sys_dict_list where sign='DICT_XZQH' ) d2 on person.hjdssxdm=d2.code left join ( select * from sys_dict_list where sign='DICT_XZQH' ) d3 on person.xzdqhdm=d3.code left join LEDEN_COLLECT_SGTZZC stz on stz.RYJCXXCJBH=person.RYJCXXCJBH left join leden_collect_dna d on d.ryjcxxcjbh=person.ryjcxxcjbh
where person.ryjcxxcjbh=#{_parameter} and d1.sign='DICT_RYCJYY'
select count(*) from leden_collect_person where CJSJ >= #{startDate} and CJSJ < #{endDate}
